info.name: Better mySMS
info.description: A better design for mySMS. Larger view, no bullshit and a simpler and flusher interface.
info.additionalInfo:
version 1.3.1 – fixed a bug with mySMS update
version 1.3 – bring some Material Design and bring back preferences pane
version 1.2 – transparent bottom bar & debug call log
version 1.1 – integer font-face
version 1.0 – initial release
